text: Dato' Seri Tuan Guru Haji Abdul Hadi bin Awang (Jawi: حاج عبدالهادي اوڠ, born 20 October 1947) is a Malaysian politician. He is President of the Malaysian Islamic Party (PAS), an Islamist political party in Malaysia, since 2002. He led the party in the 2018 general election, but lost. He was Menteri Besar of Terengganu from 1999 to 2004.Hooker, Othman, Clive (2003), pg 232-3 ==References== ==Other websites== * President of PAS official website Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Malaysian politicians Category:People from Terengganu Category:Al-Azhar University alumni
title: Hadi Awang
